short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly download product data from Shopify stores in CSV or JSON format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ultimate tool for Shopify store management! Shopify Products Downloader empowers you to effortlessly download unlimited product information from any Shopify store. Whether you're an eCommerce expert or just starting out, this extension saves you time and simplifies your workflow by providing product data in CSV or JSON formats. Manage multiple stores, analyze store performance, and streamline product imports like never before.

Key Features:
✅ Add Shopify Stores: Easily add and manage Shopify stores by entering their URLs.
✅ Download Unlimited Products: Export unlimited product data, including IDs, titles, descriptions, SKUs, prices, variants, and more in CSV or JSON formats.
✅ Track Apps & Themes: Identify and monitor the apps and themes used by Shopify stores.
✅ Best-Selling Products: Discover the top-performing products of any store to analyze trends.
✅ Store Analytics: Access public data insights and growth metrics for smarter decision-making.
✅ Direct Import: Seamlessly import CSV files directly into Shopify to add products effortlessly.
✅ Manage Multiple Stores: Organize and manage product data from multiple Shopify stores all in one place.
✅ User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy an intuitive and efficient design for hassle-free navigation and use.

How to Use:
➜ Enter the URL of a Shopify store and click "Add Store."
➜ Manage your added stores and update product data with a single click.
➜ Select your preferred format (CSV or JSON) and click "Download" to save the data.
➜ Use the downloaded file to import products directly into your Shopify store.
